title: Caesar Safe Solid Steel Biometric Personal Home Safe with Fast Access Fingerprint for Wall, Floor or Closet Secures Jewelry, Gun, Money, Valuables - 1.8 cubic feet
features: 1.8-cubic-foot safe with fingerprint-touch technology for quick access; ideal for storing important documents, jewelry, and other valuables; achieve greater security compared to a keypad
Biometric fingerprint sensor with 500 DPI semiconductor; excellent match speed of less than 1 second; holds up to 100 individual fingerprints; touch lifetime could reach 1,000,000 times
Heavy-duty carbon-steel construction (8-gauge steel door and 14-gauge steel body); 2 live-door bolts and pry-resistant concealed hinges for superior security
Back-up key for emergency use; includes pre-drilled mounting holes and hardware for floor and wall mounting
Exterior measures 13.8 by 13 by 19.75 inches (L x W x H); interior space measures 13.6 by 10.6 by 19.5 inches (L x W x H).
description: Lock valuables securely away with this Caesar Safe Biometric Fingerprint Safe. Available in a variety of sizes, ranging from 0.5 to 1.8 cubic feet (each sold separately), the safe provides the perfect amount of space for storing important documents, passports, jewelry, cash, and more. The Caesar Safe helps keep personal possessions protected and offers valuable peace of mind. A black exterior finish gives the safe a handsome look that will easily coordinate with any home or office setting. The Caesar safe comes equipped with a biometric fingerprint sensor, which offers even more security, compared to keypad systems. With its 500 DPI semiconductor, the safe’s biometric fingerprint sensor achieves an excellent match speed of less than 1 second, ensuring quick access to inside the safe with a simple touch of the finger. The safe’s fingerprint sensor promotes person-specific access, and it offers a large capacity, holding up to 100 individual fingerprints, which means more than one person can be granted secure access to the safe. Designed for long-lasting performance, the safe’s touch lifetime could reach up to 1,000,000 times. Durably built from heavy-duty carbon steel, the safe consists of an 8-gauge steel door and a 14-gauge steel body. Even more, the safe’s two live-door bolts and pry-resistant concealed hinges offer superior security and reliable strength, helping to prevent intruders from getting inside the safe. The safe includes an emergency back-up key, which makes it possible to bypass the fingerprint sensor. Use the key to directly open the safe and access stored items. The Caesar biometric fingerprint safe comes with pre-drilled mounting holes, which make it easy to securely mount the safe to the floor and wall. Mounting the safe adds an extra layer of deterrence, and all necessary mounting hardware comes included.
